attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Medical Experts who have unproven scientific theories (such as Shaken Baby Syndrome, Salt poisining, Munchausens by Proxy etc) should not be allowed to air their views in a court room unless supported by other tangible evidence.

These experts are too protected should anything go wrong!If they truely belive in what they say they would be willing to put their careers on the line.

rejection.details: Please replace the main sentence with an action for HM Government
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
